Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter First Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField01 6 8 R Enter a Valid Date (MM/DD/YY)
Enter Second Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField02 6 8 R Enter a Valid Date (MM/DD/YY). Must be greater than the First Date.
Enter Third Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField03 6 8 R Enter a Valid Date (MM/DD/YY). Must be greater than the First/Second Dates.
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
Enter Starting Vendor No. or (ALL) Text PPDField05 1 8 R Enter a valid vendor # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Vendor or (ALL) Text PPDField06 1 8 R Enter a valid ending vendor # or (ALL)
